hero.title: Get Fortune Reading with AI

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: AI-Powered Fortune Experience
about.intro1: Kassara is an innovative platform that brings traditional fortune telling to the modern world with AI technology.
about.intro2: We combine the knowledge of expert fortune tellers with the power of AI to provide you with the most accurate and personalized fortune experience.
about.missionText: Accessible, reliable fortune experience for everyone.
